text: hello, how are you today?  i want to chat with you about a worthy cause...
What worthy cause would that be?
this is for save the children ( URL .  have you heard of them?
Oh yes, I have heard of Save the Children.
they do a lot of great work.  they are assisting refugees.
Yes they do, we have a lot of people in need right here in the United States though.
sure; but not as much as in third world countries.  wouldnt you agree?
I think if you are suffering, truly suffering, then I don't think that person cares what country they are from.
i agree; but environmental factors has a big impact, in my opinion.
Disease knows no factor, my neighbor was bit by a tick last month and now has Lyme disease.
that is unfortunate; i am sorry to hear.  have you ever donated to a worthy organisation?
Every year, St Jude / Humane Society / and Wounded Warriors
great!  would you like to donate to save the children?  every donation makes a difference!
I think I would like to continue donating to the three charities of my choice.
this could be a fourth charity that you may add to your list.
Or it could take away from the ones I currently sponsor.
are you able to find a way to see if you can spare for this charity?  its for the kids.
I understand, but St Jude is for the kids as well.
sure; but this is also going to assist refugees in need.
I'm going to help Americans, my people. Good luck and have a great day.
thank you.  please consider this organisation for the future.  have a great day.
